title: If a girl wants to give a K-pop audition and her current age is 20 years, is there any chance of being selected in the audition? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not likely sorry because you are 20 already and you have to be a trainee which is like atleast training for a year. Then you will be 21 or so, you might get the chance to debut or not, based on your talent. Most of the contracts end at the age of 30 or so. Then you wouldn’t have much time being a kpop idol. But you could try auditioning, probably the big three won’t be a good option for you to audition for because they have more training time then the other agencies so the little companies will do the trick but still not sure about the little companies too.
